name: Fortified Swiss
description: Fortified Swiss is an immersive RPG tower defense experience featuring a grand campaign that spans across the continent of Fromage. Vast hordes of mice have invaded due to the Mouse King's insatiable desire to hoard the most artisan of cheeses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 3.2+ Compliant DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
